title: Ancylodes pallens
text:
Ancylodes pallens is a species of <a href="Pyralidae">snout moth</a> in the genus "<a href="Ancylodes">Ancylodes</a>". It was described by <a href="%C3%89mile%20Louis%20Ragonot">Émile Louis Ragonot</a> in 1887 and is known from <a href="Iran">Iran</a>, <a href="Iraq">Iraq</a>, <a href="Spain">Spain</a>, <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>, <a href="Greece">Greece</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>, <a href="Kazakhstan">Kazakhstan</a> and <a href="North%20Africa">North Africa</a>. It is a very rare immigrant to southern <a href="Great%20Britain">Great Britain</a>.
The <a href="wingspan">wingspan</a> is 18–20 mm.
